extDesc.message: Quickly clip and save notes from any web page with one click. Highlight, annotate, and export your research.

addNotePlaceholder.message: Add a note... (Enter to save, Shift+Enter for new line)

saveFailed.message: Failed to save, please try again.

confirmClearAll.message: Are you sure you want to clear all notes? This action cannot be undone.

confirmDeleteNote.message: Are you sure you want to delete this note?
